attributes.action: use whatever means possible to ensure that  the Freedom of Information (Exemption) Bill does not become law,
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Freedom of Information (Exemption) Bill is seen by some as an attempt by Parliament to withold sensitive information regarding Member's expenses.
This petition implores the Prime Minister to persuade the House of Lords to block this bill. If the bill reaches the statute book we implore the Prime Minister to repeal or ammend the bill (or Act) to remove the clauses allowing Members to keep their expenses from their constituents.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
